text: John Adedayo B. Adegboyega (born 17 March 1992), better known as John Boyega, is a British actor. He is best known for playing Finn in Star Wars: The Force Awakens (2015), Star Wars: The Last Jedi (2017) and Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker (2019). He has also appeared in Attack the Block (2011), Detroit (2017) and Pacific Rim: Uprising (2018). He won the 2016 BAFTA Rising Star Award. Boyega was born in Peckham, London. His parents are Nigerian. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from London Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Black British actors Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:People from Peckham
title: John Boyega
